actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to provide for the continuing requirement of Medicaid coverage of nonemergency transportation to medically necessary items and services, and for other purposes.
short_title: Protecting Patients Transportation to Care Act
subjects: Department of Health and Human Services

summary.text:
Protecting Patients Transportation to Care Act

This bill provides statutory authority for the requirement that state Medicaid programs cover nonemergency transportation to medically necessary items and services. The bill also requires programs, as a condition of federal payment for such services, to have transportation coordination plans and utilization management guidelines.

titles.title: Protecting Patients Transportation to Care Act
Protecting Patients Transportation to Care Act

A bill to amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to provide for the continuing requirement of Medicaid coverage of nonemergency transportation to medically necessary items and services, and for other purposes.
